name: Descent of Divinity
description: When there is Albedo on the field, who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has Solar Isotoma, then your characters' Plunging Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element and deals +1 DMG.
descriptionraw: When there is $[A1604] on the field, who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116041]</color>, then your characters' $[K52] costs 1 less $[K309] and deals +1 DMG.
descriptionreplaced: When there is Albedo on the field, who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Solar Isotoma</color>, then your characters' <color=#FFFFFFFF>Plunging Attack</color> costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color> and deals +1 DMG.
